tasks.description: Create `.github/workflows/publish-docs.yml` workflow file
Configure workflow_dispatch trigger for manual triggering
Add concurrency block with group `publish-docs` and `cancel-in-progress: true`
Add GitHub App token creation step using `actions/create-github-app-token@v2` with app-id `2280081`
Add checkout step using the GitHub App installation token
Add git configuration step (user.name and user.email as github-actions[bot])
Add step to compile main design document using `xu-cheng/latex-action@v4`
Add step to compile poster using `xu-cheng/latex-action@v4` with `working_directory: poster`
Add step to copy `main.pdf` to `www/documents/DesignDoc.pdf`
Add step to copy `poster/poster.pdf` to `www/documents/Poster.pdf`
Add step to commit and push updated PDFs with message "docs: update published documents [skip ci]"
Add workflow summary step writing to `$GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY`
Configure appropriate permissions (`contents: write`)
Verify workflow appears in GitHub Actions UI
Test manual trigger via "Run workflow" button
Verify both PDFs are generated correctly
Verify PDFs are committed to `www/documents/` with correct names
Verify GitHub App token is used for commits (check commit author is github-actions[bot])
Verify concurrency control cancels in-progress runs when retriggered
Verify workflow summary is displayed after successful run
